result.eng: At first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ga: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.orig: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.html: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ponchtml: Ar dtús ba ṁaiṫ liom fáilte a ċur roiṁ gaċ éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.

result.eng: I would like to welcome you to Ireland.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur romhaibh go hÉirinn
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur romhaibh go hÉirinn
result.html: Ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur romhaibh go hÉirinnI would like to welcome you to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom fáilte a ċur roṁaiḃ go hÉirinnI would like to welcome you to Ireland.

result.eng: You will be wemcome anytime.
result.ga: Beidh fáilte romhat am ar bith
result.orig: Beidh fáilte romhat am ar bith
result.html: Beidh fáilte romhat am ar bithYou will be wemcome anytime.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ fáilte roṁat am ar biṫYou will be wemcome anytime.

result.eng: I was studying hard before the exams.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.orig: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.html: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduitheI was studying hard before the exams.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag staidéar go dian roiṁ na scrúduiṫeI was studying hard before the exams.

result.eng: That was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ga: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.orig: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.html: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé sin ar eolas againn ón ḟaisnéis a fuair muid roiṁ réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.

result.eng: They protected me from the cold.
result.ga: Chosain siad roimh an fhuacht mé
result.orig: Chosain siad roimh an fhuacht mé
result.html: Chosain siad roimh an fhuacht méThey protected me from the cold.
result.ponchtml: Ċosain siad roiṁ an ḟuaċt méThey protected me from the cold.

result.eng: I was welcomed.
result.ga: Cuireadh fáilte romham
result.orig: Cuireadh fáilte romham
result.html: Cuireadh fáilte romhamI was welcomed.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ fáilte roṁamI was welcomed.

result.eng: Let's welcome the new year.
result.ga: Cuirimis fáilte roimh an bhliain úr
result.orig: Cuirimis fáilte roimh an bhliain úr
result.html: Cuirimis fáilte roimh an bhliain úrLet's welcome the new year.
result.ponchtml: Cuirimis fáilte roiṁ an ḃliain úrLet's welcome the new year.

result.eng: Everyone is welcome.
result.ga: Fáilte roimh chách
result.orig: Fáilte roimh chách
result.html: Fáilte roimh cháchEveryone is welcome.
result.ponchtml: Fáilte roiṁ ċáċEveryone is welcome.

result.eng: Whenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ga: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.orig: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.html: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beiḋ fáilte roṁatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.

result.eng: Don't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ga: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.orig: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.html: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ponchtml: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roiṁ an ainmḟocal sa ċás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.

result.eng: She stood before me in the queue.
result.ga: Sheas sí romham sa scuaine
result.orig: Sheas sí romham sa scuaine
result.html: Sheas sí romham sa scuaineShe stood before me in the queue.
result.ponchtml: Ṡeas sí roṁam sa scuaineShe stood before me in the queue.

result.eng: I'm scared of water.
result.ga: Tá eagla orm roimh uisce
result.orig: Tá eagla orm roimh uisce
result.html: Tá eagla orm roimh uisceI'm scared of water.
result.ponchtml: Tá eagla orm roiṁ uisceI'm scared of water.

result.eng: New people are always welcome.
result.ga: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaí
result.orig: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaí
result.html: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaíNew people are always welcome.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roiṁ ḋaoine nua i gcónaíNew people are always welcome.

result.eng: Opinions are welcome.
result.ga: Tá fáilte roimh thuairimí
result.orig: Tá fáilte roimh thuairimí
result.html: Tá fáilte roimh thuairimíOpinions are welcome.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roiṁ ṫuairimíOpinions are welcome.

result.eng: Welcome to Ireland, friends!
result.ga: Tá fáilte romhaibh go hÉirinn a chairde

result.html: Tá fáilte romhaibh go hÉirinn a chairdeWelcome to Ireland, friends!
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roṁaiḃ go hÉirinn a ċairdeWelcome to Ireland, friends!

result.eng: You're welcome.
result.ga: Tá fáilte romhaibh
result.orig: Tá fáilte romhaibh
result.html: Tá fáilte romhaibhYou're welcome.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roṁaiḃYou're welcome.

result.eng: Welcome to Ireland.
result.ga: Tá fáilte romhat go hÉirinn

result.html: Tá fáilte romhat go hÉirinnWelcome to Ireland.

result.eng: You're welcome.

result.orig: Tá fáilte romhat
result.html: Tá fáilte romhatYou're welcome.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roṁatYou're welcome.

result.eng: A lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.
result.ga: Tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainn
result.orig: Tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainn

result.ponchtml: Tá neart oibre fós le déanaṁ sna blianta amaċ roṁainnA lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.

result.eng: Thank you. - You're welcome.
result.ga: Go raibh maith agat - Tá fáilte romhat
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat - Tá fáilte romhat
result.html: Go raibh maith agat - Tá fáilte romhatThank you. - You're welcome.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat - Tá fáilte roṁatThank you. - You're welcome.

result.eng: Hello! Welcome.
result.ga: Dia dhuit Fáilte romhat isteach
result.orig: Dia dhuit Fáilte romhat isteach
result.html: Dia dhuit Fáilte romhat isteachHello! Welcome.
result.ponchtml: Dia ḋuit Fáilte roṁat isteaċHello! Welcome.

result.eng: Welcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.
result.ga: Tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais Ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní Loideáin
result.orig: Tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais Ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní Loideáin

result.eng: A bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.ga: Leagadh buidéal uisce beatha roimhe
result.orig: Leagadh buidéal uisce beatha roimhe
result.html: Leagadh buidéal uisce beatha roimheA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.ponchtml: Leagaḋ buidéal uisce beaṫa roiṁeA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.

result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.html: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċúis éigin ḃí eagla orm roiṁ na madraí marḃa cé naċ raiḃ cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.

result.eng: She was kicking the pavement gravel in front of herself.
result.ga: Bhí sí ag ciceáil ghairbhéal an chosáin amach roimpi
result.orig: Bhí sí ag ciceáil ghairbhéal an chosáin amach roimpi
result.html: Bhí sí ag ciceáil ghairbhéal an chosáin amach roimpiShe was kicking the pavement gravel in front of herself.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ag ciceáil ġairḃéal an ċosáin amaċ roimpiShe was kicking the pavement gravel in front of herself.

result.eng: She came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ga: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.orig: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.html: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais ShóivéadaighShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sí go Meiriceá roiṁ ṫitim an Aontais ṠóivéadaiġShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.orig: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.html: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: I was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.orig: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.html: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romhamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag réitiú do mo ḃainis naċ raiḃ aċ aon lá déag roṁamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.

result.eng: It was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ga: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-EabhracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé díreaċ roiṁ a naoi a ċlog i Nua-EaḃracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: Ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.

result.eng: Before them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ga: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.orig: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.html: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ponchtml: Baile beag suaraċ ocraċ beadaí a ḃí amaċ rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.

result.eng: They took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ga: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.orig: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.html: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roiṁ an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.

result.eng: Babaí was very happy to see him. {to welcome him when he arrived}
result.ga: Bhí lúcháir mhór ar Bhabaí roimhe
result.orig: Bhí lúcháir mhór ar Bhabaí roimhe
result.html: Bhí lúcháir mhór ar Bhabaí roimheBabaí was very happy to see him. {to welcome him when he arrived}
